items.sentence: Tom wasn\'t as handsome as Mary said he was.
Tom put on his glasses to read the contract.
Tom put some branches into the wood chipper.
Tom raised his rifle and pointed it at Mary.
I told Tom that I couldn\'t go to his party.
I told Tom that I didn\'t know how to dance.
I told Tom that I wouldn\'t be at his party.
Tom doesn\'t know exactly how that happened.
Tom doesn\'t know exactly how to explain it.
Tom doesn\'t know how much money Mary makes.
Tom doesn\'t know how much money was stolen.
Tom doesn\'t know what Mary is trying to do.
Would you like me to massage your shoulders?
Tom usually leaves for school at about 7:30.
Tom wanted Mary to stay a little bit longer.
Don\'t act like you don\'t know what I mean.
I thought that\'s what you would\'ve wanted.
I thought that you\'d end up married to Tom.
Tom told me that he liked working in Boston.
People sometimes exaggerate their abilities.
